name: software_engineering_backend
description:
Simplified Vision-agent (architect payload processor) + Coder-agent (file generator) local backend.

Flows:
 - Start vision server: npm run start:vision  # serves /api/vision/analyze for architect payloads
 - Start coder server: npm run start:coder   # receives forwarded payloads from vision-agent
 - Start both (background): npm run start:all  # convenient for local dev
 - Run end-to-end test: npm run test:architect  # tests architect payload flow

scripts.start:all: start cmd /k "node vision-agent/server.js" & start cmd /k "node coder-agent/server.js"
scripts.lint: echo "Linting not configured yet - run 'npm install eslint --save-dev' to set up"
scripts.test: echo "Tests not configured yet - run 'npm install jest --save-dev' to set up"
